channel.title: [Req] Dropping all your items when you've died
channel.description:
Has anyone got a code that once you die to a monster or a player, you drop your whole invo. and what your wearing?
Btw i'm running nixscape
It would be very helpful if you could help :)

item.title: [Req] Dropping all your items when you've died
item.dc:creator: @WhiteFang WhiteFang
item.description:
@WhiteFang wrote:

well, the best way to check it wich item is most expensive, is to call the shop prices and make it check wich 3 items have the highest price, those 3 you keep, the others will be dropped (do this for 4 items if you are having that prayer on to keep 1 more item then usually)

Read full topic
item.source: [Req] Dropping all your items when you've died

item.title: [Req] Dropping all your items when you've died
item.dc:creator: @masonw masonw
item.description:
@masonw wrote:

replace your public boolean ApplyDead with this

It wont drop but it will remove all the items.

public boolean ApplyDead() { if(IsDeadTimer == false){ actionAmount++; actionTimer = 20; ResetAttack(); ResetAttackNPC(); setAnimation(0x900); sendMessage("You have died."); removeAllItems(); IsDeadTimer = true; } if(actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true){ teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; IsDeadTeleporting = true; playerLevel[playerHitpoints] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]); setSkillLevel(playerHitpoints, playerLevel[playerHitpoints], playerXP[playerHitpoints]); resetAnimation(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } return true; }

Read full topic
item.source: [Req] Dropping all your items when you've died
